solution_line_template: The theater can hold {capacity} people and they charge ${ticket_price} to watch a movie so on a sold-out night they make {capacity}*{ticket_price} = $<<{capacity}*{ticket_price}={sold_out_revenue}>>{sold_out_revenue}

On Tuesday night they only sold {tickets_sold_tuesday} tickets at ${ticket_price} apiece so they made {tickets_sold_tuesday}*{ticket_price} = $<<{tickets_sold_tuesday}*{ticket_price}={tuesday_revenue}>>{tuesday_revenue}

If they make ${sold_out_revenue} on a sold-out night and they only made ${tuesday_revenue} on Tuesday then they lost {sold_out_revenue}-{tuesday_revenue} = $<<{sold_out_revenue}-{tuesday_revenue}={money_lost}>>{money_lost}
